fullplot: When gorgeous Italian temptress Sophia Rosselini's School for Seduction arrives in Newcastle, four friends-each hoping to release their inner sex goddess-sign up for an education in the 'seductive arts.' Taking their cue from sultry Sophia, the newly confident women unleash themselves upon their unsuspecting partners with lustful abandon.
plot: An Italian temptress arrives at a school in Newcastle to teach a group of Geordies about the art of romance.
title: School for Seduction
